amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to Rules Committee Print 114-32.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to make technical and conforming changes to Rules Committee Print 114-32.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Shuster to the Rules amendment (A001).
